staxel.village.character.dialogue.Cirahn: ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; promises she will never put anything strange in the food!
If ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; wants to use you as a test subject for a new potion, she'll ask first.
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; wonders if you're ready to surrender your soul yet?
As roomies, we're already practically soulmates!
A new cauldron would be nice...
But ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; doesn't think the house is big enough for the one she used to have...
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; sometimes doesn't feel quite at home being so close to the village...
But then when ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop; is around, it feels a bit better mya!
